GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, defaulted ordered by date in a descending order

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the article with the provided article id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the article with the provided article id and returns the updated article

inputs.inc_votes: amount to change votes property by, can be positive or negative

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments with the provided article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment with the provided article id to the comments table

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes the comment with the provided article id from the comments array, no content returned
